page.title: 19 A CHICKEN FARM
page.content:
Bonnets farm stocks thousands of chickens every year.When we went they had over{3000}two week old chickens. They have 4 sheds full of chicks and chickens.There were 6 more sheds with about 5000 chickens all laying eggs. In total there were 3456 laying hens. There are over 360 eggs laid each day.They also sell chicken feed, eggs,turkey,chicken and other meats. Bonnet's farm has a light machine and an egg grader.When you put eggs on they go down a conveyer belt where a strong light shows you whether they are cracked or bad.Then they are graded according to weight. { {Here are the percentages of egg sizes.
size 1 5% size 4 25% size 2 15% size 5 15% size 3 25% size 6 15%
